channel.title: old on Damaris Zurell research
channel.description: Recent content in old on Damaris Zurell research

item.title: RangeDyna
item.description: Moving from pattern towards process for improved forecasts of species range dynamics - DAAD research exchange with Univ. Melbourne (2019-2020).

item.title: SCODA
item.description: Scaling from individual interactions to community dynamics in avian assemblages - Ambizione project funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation SNF (2016-2019).

item.title: SPEEDMIND
item.description: Improving species biodiversity analyses and citizen science feedback - Interdisciplinary project funded by the Swiss Data Science Center (2017-2019).

item.title: MATES
item.description: Understanding and predicting multispecies assemblages and interactions - Marie Curie fellowship funded by FP7 (2014-2016).

item.title: PhD thesis
item.description: Improve species range predictions for scenarios of environmental change - PhD research (2007-2011).
